reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: TB/HIV Epidemic Control in Malawi: Bringing Innovations to Scale.

description.narrative: Malawi - TB/HIV - ActionAid International Malawi - AA. This program has the following goals: Reduce the number of new infections towards elimination of HIV transmission by 2030. Reduce HIV-related morbidity and mortality. Reduce morbidity and mortality from tuberculosis. The objectives of this program are: 90% of PLHIV know their status. 90% of diagnosed PLHIV are on ART. 90% of PLHIV on ART are virally suppressed. Reduce the number of new HIV infections among key and vulnerable populations. Increase TB case notification. Increase Treatment success of bacteriolgically confirmed TB case to 88%. Increase case finding of RR/MDR TB to 60%

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for MWI-C-AA
Number of adolescent girls and young women (AGYW) who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
Percentage of MSM that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - individual and/or smaller group level interventions
Number of notified cases of all forms of TB (i.e. bacteriologically confirmed + clinically diagnosed), new and relapse cases
Number of women and men aged 15+ who received an HIV test and know their results
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number of notified TB cases (all forms) contributed by non-national TB program providers – community referrals
Percentage of notified TB cases, all forms, contributed by non-NTP providers - community referrals
DOTS-other 2: Number of HIV patients receiving adherence support at community level
Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - individual and/or smaller group level interventions
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
YP-other 1: Percentage of in-school girls who received Sex and Sexuality education
DOTS-other 1: Number of TB patients receiving adherence support at community level
YP-other 3: Number of out-of-school girls who received training in local production of sanitary pads
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of young people aged 10–24 years reached by life skills–based HIV education in schools
Percentage of adolescent girls and young women (AGYW) reached with HIV prevention programs- defined package of services
YP-other 2: Percentage of out-of-school girls who received training in Village Savings Loans
YP-other 4: Percentage of out-of-school girls who received information on Sexual and Reproductive Health
